Package com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Classes implementing the OpenDJ CLI shared APIs.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DocDescriptionSupplement
    Documentation that supplements generated descriptions.
    HelpCallback
    An interface for displaying help interactively.
    Menu<T>
    An interactive console-based menu.
    MenuCallback<T>
    A menu call-back which should be associated with each menu option.
    SubCommandUsageHandler
    A handler for printing sub-command usage information.
    ToolRefDocContainer
    An interface for an object that holds reference documentation for a command-line tool.
    ValidationCallback<T>
    An interface for validating user input.
    VersionHandler
    A handler for printing product version.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    This class defines a generic argument that may be used in the argument list for an application.
    ArgumentConstants
    This class contains short and long options used by the argument in CLI.
    ArgumentGroup
    Class for organizing options into logical groups when argument usage is printed.
    ArgumentParser
    This class defines a utility that can be used to deal with command-line arguments for applications in a CLIP-compliant manner using either short one-character or longer word-based arguments.
    BooleanArgument
    This class defines an argument type that will be used to represent Boolean values.
    BooleanArgument.Builder
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing BooleanArgument.
    CliConstants
    This class defines a number of constants used by tools.
    CliMessages
    This file contains localizable message descriptors having the resource name com.forgerock.opendj.cli.cli.
    CommandBuilder
    Class used to be able to generate the non interactive mode.
    CommonArguments
    This class regroup commons arguments used by the different CLI.
    ConnectionFactoryProvider
    A connection factory designed for use with command line tools.
    ConsoleApplication
    This class provides an abstract base class which can be used as the basis of a console-based application.
    DocGenerationHelper
    This class provides utility functions to help generate reference documentation.
    FileBasedArgument
    This class defines an argument whose value will be read from a file rather than actually specified on the command-line.
    FileBasedArgument.Builder
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing FileBasedArgument.
    IntegerArgument
    This class defines an argument type that will only accept integer values, and potentially only those in a given range.
    IntegerArgument.Builder
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing IntegerArgument.
    MenuBuilder<T>
    An interface for incrementally building a command-line menu.
    MenuResult<T>
    The result of running a Menu.
    MultiChoiceArgument<V>
    This class defines an argument type that will only accept one or more of a specific set of string values.
    MultiChoiceArgument.Builder<V>
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing MultiChoiceArgument.
    MultiColumnPrinter
    Utility class for printing columns of data.
    MultiColumnPrinter.Builder
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing MultiColumnPrinter.
    MultiColumnPrinter.Column
    This class describes a Column of data used in the MultiColumnPrinter.
    PromptingTrustManager
    A trust manager which prompts the user for the length of time that they would like to trust a server certificate.
    StringArgument
    This class defines an argument type that will accept any string value.
    StringArgument.Builder
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing StringArgument.
    SubCommand
    This class defines a data structure for holding information about a subcommand that may be used with the subcommand argument parser.
    SubCommandArgumentParser
    This class defines a variant of the argument parser that can be used with applications that use subcommands to customize their behavior and that have a different set of options per subcommand (e.g, "cvs checkout" takes different options than "cvs commit").
    TableBuilder
    A class which can be used to construct tables of information to be displayed in a terminal.
    TablePrinter
    An interface for incrementally configuring a table serializer.
    TableSerializer
    An interface for serializing tables.
    TabSeparatedTablePrinter
    An interface for creating a tab-separated formatted table.
    TextTablePrinter
    An interface for creating a text based table.
    ToolVersionHandler
    Class that prints the version of the SDK to System.out.
    Utils
    This class provides utility functions for all the client side tools.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsoleApplication.Style
    Defines the different line styles for output.
    MultiColumnPrinter.Alignment
    The data alignment.
    ReturnCode
    List of return codes used by CLIs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ArgumentException
    This class defines an exception that may be thrown if there is a problem with an argument definition.
    ClientException
    This class defines an exception that may be thrown if a local problem occurs in a Directory Server client.
